== Learning

You are given a string [#MathJax-Element-1-Frame .MathJax_SVG]#image:data:image/svg+xml;base64,[data:image/svg+xml;base64,]# consisting only of digits `+0-9+`, commas `+,+`, and dots `+.+`

Your task is to complete the `+regex_pattern+` defined below, which will be used to _re.split()_ all of the `+,+` and `+.+` symbols in [#MathJax-Element-2-Frame .MathJax_SVG]#image:data:image/svg+xml;base64,[data:image/svg+xml;base64,]#.

Itâ€™s guaranteed that every comma and every dot in [#MathJax-Element-3-Frame .MathJax_SVG]#image:data:image/svg+xml;base64,[data:image/svg+xml;base64,]# is preceeded and followed by a digit.

*Sample Input 0*

....
100,000,000.000
....

*Sample Output 0*

....
100
000
000
000
....
